name: Asteroids (itch) (Tomás Bruckner Kambo)
description:
DISCLAIMER

I don't own the Asteroids rights or the music. I made this game just for educational purposes and not for comercial use (all types of payments are disabled).

DESCRIPTION

Replica of the original Atari Asteroids game. Made with Unity 5.0, GIMP 2.0 and Audacity.

Overall work time: 48 hours.

Original game: https://www.atari.com/arcade#!/arcade/asteroids/play

CONTROLS

Right/Left arrows: Rotate.

Up/Down arrows: accelerate.

SPACE: Shoot

Cheers,
Tomás
